imdb.title: Yami shibai
imdb.plot: Every week at 5 p.m. an old man in a yellow mask shows up at a children's playground and tells them ghost stories based on myths and urban legends of Japanese origin. The man tells the stories on the back of his bicycle using a tr...

episodes.title: A Job to Quit
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain man who's not sure what to do.

episodes.title: Ending Note
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain group of siblings whose father has died at home, unnoticed by anyone.

episodes.title: The End of the Day
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain middle schooler.

episodes.title: Last Train
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain man who is late heading home, after going out for drinks.

episodes.title: The Last Customer
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain college student who works at a cafe.

episodes.title: Trash Drop-off
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain woman who has recently moved.

episodes.title: Casamento do Rato
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain man in a rural community on a business trip.

episodes.title: The Man in the Rabbit Hutch
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain woman who teaches at an elementary school.

episodes.title: The 44th Sheep
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain college student, who has a problem, and his friend.

episodes.title: Lapdog
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain woman who has started pet-sitting.

episodes.title: Papier-mâché Tiger
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain man whose son had passed away in an accident.

episodes.title: Spirit Ox
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain man waking from a nap.

episodes.title: Mr. Rooster
episodes.plot: This is the story of a certain man who's in a band.

episodes.title: Dropped Handkerchief
episodes.plot: This is the story of a group of youngsters who have come to an abandoned house to test their courage.

episodes.title: Death Day
episodes.plot: A family who gathers once a year on the anniversary of their mother's death. It looked like a family gathering, but Sachiko, the new wife who participated for the first time, gradually began to feel a disturbing atmosphere.

episodes.title: Don't Look Back
episodes.plot: Takuya, a young man who got lost. He meets a dubious woman, Miyako, in an alley in a residential area. Miyako says, "Never look behind you in the future." Why is that.

episodes.title: Bean-Throwing
episodes.plot: A young boy decides to protect his mother from a demon.

episodes.title: The Sound of Laughter
episodes.plot: A young man hears an old woman laughing outside of his house.

episodes.title: Catch of the Day
episodes.plot: A man comes home after a fishing trip with a strange catch.

episodes.title: Issun Boshi
episodes.plot: A college couple discuss Issun Boshi, a creature who grants a wish to whomever catches him.

episodes.title: Viewing
episodes.plot: A student is called by her teacher telling her that the school will be closed the next day for a viewing. She and her friends decide to investigate.

episodes.title: Antlion Pit
episodes.plot: A women ends up in a strange park after a long day of work.

episodes.title: Footprints in the Snow
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Curse
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: String Telephone
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Sleeptalking
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Haitatsu
episodes.plot: A young man agrees to pick up a package for his friend.

episodes.title: Nemurenu ko
episodes.plot: The son of a young woman cannot sleep as strange things start to happen.

episodes.title: Resepushonrumu
episodes.plot: An elderly couple receives a doll with very lifelike eyes.

episodes.title: Kaiga
episodes.plot: A young man visits an art exhibit and takes a photograph of the pictures after being told not to.

episodes.title: Sabisu shuryonoshirase
episodes.plot: A businessman checks into a hotel while traveling and passes by three funerals. Strange things start happening in his hotel room.

episodes.title: Beranda
episodes.plot: A woman hears a strange sound coming from her veranda.

episodes.title: Koshudenwa
episodes.plot: A woman gets a call for help from her sister using a pay phone. When she arrives, there is no one there . . .

episodes.title: Seki
episodes.plot: A young man lives in an apartment with an elderly neighbor who always complains about the noise he is making.

episodes.title: Erebeta no on'na
episodes.plot: A woman boards an elevator with a man holding a strange bag.

episodes.title: Manga kafe
episodes.plot: A manga cafe employee finds an object and later a strange woman comes looking for a lost earring.

episodes.title: Ritorushisutazurumu
episodes.plot: A young man goes into his younger sister's room, looking for one of his manga. He finds it under her bed, but gets stuck underneath when his sister and a friend come in the room.

episodes.title: Fitting Room
episodes.plot: A young lady visits a clothing shop where the fitting room warns to only take one item at a time inside. She ignores this warning.

episodes.title: Refrigerator
episodes.plot: A refrigerator watches a family.

episodes.title: Thunderous visitor
episodes.plot: Ryousuke, a young man who has had a childhood fear of thunder recalls how his mother once told him when he was five, that she will protect him from thunder. Five months later, she moved out, so now he lives with his father. Suddenly, he experiences a blackout in his apartment.

episodes.title: Tomonashi Cave
episodes.plot: A group of high school students are taking part of a tour in the Tomonashi Cave. The tour guide says that it's believed that the wind blowing in the cave can sound like a young girl's cry.

episodes.title: The Wind's Warning
episodes.plot: A salary man, Hide, has just returned home to his apartment when he feels the wind blow. He enters his room and finds the balcony door wide open.

episodes.title: Swamp Offering
episodes.plot: A couple who has just recently married moves to a village in the countryside where the husband once lived as a child.

episodes.title: The Dripping
episodes.plot: A man is on his way home from work. At the Yms-mart, he stops to read a newspaper before deciding it's getting late. However, the moment he steps outside, it begins to rain.

episodes.title: Sakura
episodes.plot: A man has been hospitalized after getting in a car accident that broke his right arm and right leg. Outside his hospital room, he hears children say that perhaps he might be a new friend to play with.

episodes.title: Frog Eggs
episodes.plot: Takuya, a shy boy from Tokyo, has moved with his parents in the countryside. His parents note how happier he is now, much better than when he was in Tokyo.

episodes.title: Sea Fortunes
episodes.plot: A crowd gathers at the docks where a soaked, frightened woman named Chisato has wrapped a blanket around her. The people wonders if something bad happened to her.

episodes.title: Mud Games
episodes.plot: One rainy day, a woman is driving to pick up her daughter, Michiko from daycare.

episodes.title: Tree of Innocence
episodes.plot: A pair of young twin brothers, Satoshi and Takashi are in the forest, exploring. They argue over whether they should go home or not.

episodes.title: Frozen Memories
episodes.plot: A hiker gets caught in a severe blizzard while climbing a mountain trail so he takes shelter in a shack only to realize he's not alone.

episodes.title: Waterfall drop
episodes.plot: A group of four friends (two boys, two girls) takes a trip through the forest only to find themselves lost.

episodes.title: Echoes
episodes.plot: A pair of college girls have climbed to the top of the mountain. Out of boredom, one of them, Eriko shouts loud to hear her own echoes.

episodes.title: Wrong Number
episodes.plot: A young woman realized her dream and married an elite businessman. However, contrary to her ideal, her new husband works so much that he has no time for his family, and things aren't going as smoothly as she'd imagined with her new stepchild.

episodes.title: Give It to Me
episodes.plot: The story of a certain office lady. On her way home from work, she meets a young girl in the park who persistently asks her to give her things. The moment she begins to see her past self in this young girl, things take a frightening turn. Can she escape the darkness of material desire?

episodes.title: The Crow Children
episodes.plot: The story of a woman and her young daughter visiting family in the countryside. On the way there, they meet a somewhat eerie-looking old woman dressed all in black, and this meeting entangles the mother and daughter in something disturbing.

episodes.title: Copycat
episodes.plot: The story of two girls who have been together in all things since they were children. Yukari has always been the type who wanted to do everything her best friend Haru did. It's unclear whether she acts out of envy, love, or madness, but her feelings become a darkness that leads to a tragic fate.

episodes.title: Shadows of Women
episodes.plot: The story of a woman who wishes for happiness after getting married. However, her husband always comes home late from work, leaving her feeling doubtful.

episodes.title: Giveback-sama
episodes.plot: A high school girl is heartbroken after her boyfriend left her for her best friend. She's still in shock when she stumbles upon a book of incantations. One incantation in its pages sucks her into a whirlpool of terror.

episodes.title: Hide-and-Seek
episodes.plot: The story of a family visiting the countryside. The grandma tells her grandson Takeshi that he must not go near the house with the mountain behind it. But Takeshi, during a game of hide-and-seek with his cousins, disobeys his grandma and enters the forbidden house. From there, Takeshi is led into a world of darkness.

episodes.title: The Neighbors
episodes.plot: A young woman moves into a new apartment and notices something strange about a neighboring apartment.

episodes.title: If You Want to See Ghosts
episodes.plot: A girl shows her friend how to see ghosts.

episodes.title: Flower Reading
episodes.plot: A man finds a girl who tells fortunes from flower petals.

episodes.title: I'm the Only One
episodes.plot: A young woman treasures her long beautiful hair.

episodes.title: The last bus
episodes.plot: An office worker boards the last bus of the day and strange things start to happen.

episodes.title: Seductress
episodes.plot: Instead of the usual opening, the story begins with a detective following the case of the disappearance of young men in a local area. The trail leads to the Mantis Bar where eyewitnesses say they made contact with a particular woman. A woman, whom the man she's with claims to be an actress, tells his date she wants him. While a young man drinks his beverage in slight jealousy, the detective from earlier watches the pair outside. Soon, the woman comes back and finds the young man still at his seat. She explains she got stood up, and the young man says he knew since he ...

episodes.title: Tongue
episodes.plot: A business on his way home from work spots a cat lying lifelessly in the road after being hit by a car. He carries it to the sidewalk, but it's clearly beyond help, so he makes a grave for it and heads home. That night, while relaxing at home, he hears what sounds like a kitten's cry.

episodes.title: Fish Tank
episodes.plot: A boy in middle school learns of a creepy old house near his school. He decides to check it out and, once inside, discovers a large fish tank in one room. Curious to know what's in it, he cautiously peers through the glass.

episodes.title: Sewing Shears
episodes.plot: A young woman in college has moved into a certain old apartment building. As she is unpacking her belongings, she sees a spot on the wooden floor where a mismatched board has been added. Curious, she lifts the board to find a dirt surface with a pair of rusty scissors stuck in the ground -

episodes.title: Red High Heel
episodes.plot: A business has missed the last train after working overtime. He tries to hail a taxi some distance from the train station, but is unable to catch one. As he's wondering what he should do, he spots a vacant taxi racing along an empty street at high speed and finally manages to catch a ride.

episodes.title: Night Bus
episodes.plot: A group of college students sets off on a night bus to go on vacation. On the way, one of them develops a stomachache and asks the driver to stop at a service area along the highway. But when he returns from the bathroom, the atmosphere inside the bus is very different..

episodes.title: Guess Who?
episodes.plot: A high school student is visiting an amusement park with an older member of her club, whom she has a crush on. She's thrilled at the prospect of going on this date with the senpai she admires. But on the way home, they see a creepy woman on the train platform, and from that point onward, the girl's head is overtaken by a frightening suspicion.

episodes.title: Footsteps
episodes.plot: A husband, after finally receiving some time off, accompanies his wife on a shopping trip. Along the way, he receives an invitation from a friend to go out for drinks. To avoid upsetting his wife, he replies to his friend in a bathroom stall, but then he notices some creepy writing on the wall.

episodes.title: Cassette Tape
episodes.plot: A man has returned to his hometown to attend the wedding of a friend from elementary school. To please his family, he arrives a day early to stay at his parents' home the night before. As he's marveling at how his childhood bedroom hasn't changed at all, he discovers a cassette tape in a desk drawer labeled "What Happened Today" and decides to listen to it.

episodes.title: Grinding Teeth
episodes.plot: An office lady uses some of her paid leave to go on a trip with her coworkers, but during the trip, she develops a toothache. Hoping to get it fixed even though she's on vacation, she visits a local, old-looking dental clinic. The dentist takes one look at her tooth and shoves pliers into her mouth to pull it without asking for her approval.

episodes.title: Calling Crane
episodes.plot: Some middle school girls are staying over at a classmate's house. At school that day, the girls had agreed to perform a ritual at the sleepover that they believe will let them speak to the dead.

episodes.title: White Line
episodes.plot: A new teacher is staying after school grading tests for her class. When she glances out the window, she sees a student in an unfamiliar, old-looking school uniform, laying white powder lines in the schoolyard.

episodes.title: Snow Hut
episodes.plot: A boy in elementary school has been brought to the snowy country by his parents to visit his grandparents over winter break. He doesn't often see snow, so he's overjoyed to have snowball fights and build snow huts with his cousin. Then, in a grove of trees, they find a snow hut with no entrance.

episodes.title: Underground Walkway
episodes.plot: A college student is caught in a sudden rainfall on the way home from a night out drinking. He attempts to take shelter until the rain stops, but discovers an underground path to the train station and heads down it.

episodes.title: Lend It to Me
episodes.plot: A young man visits a bathhouse. A woman on the other side continually asks him for things, which he finds strange since no one else is in the bathhouse.

episodes.title: Tunnel
episodes.plot: Two men are travelling and run out of gas in a tunnel.

episodes.title: Rat
episodes.plot: A young couple moves into an apartment infested with rats and the young lady is bitten by one.

episodes.title: The Noisy Hospital Room
episodes.plot: A man in a hospital notices strange noises coming from a hospital room.

episodes.title: Museum of Taxidermy
episodes.plot: A young couple visits a taxidermy museum.

episodes.title: "That Side" Festival
episodes.plot: Two girls attend a festival, but something strange happens.

episodes.title: Behind
episodes.plot: At the Kuchiya Inn, during a school field trip, all of the students are asleep, except for three boys. One of them, Osamu, tells his friends he doesn't want to sleep because he's been having a nightmare recently.

episodes.title: The Empress Doll
episodes.plot: Two teenage couple visit an abandoned house for a test of courage. They find a set of dolls where the Empress doll is missing.

episodes.title: The Fourth Man
episodes.plot: Two high school students run into the handshake men.

episodes.title: Merry-go-round
episodes.plot: A young couple are at a mall carnival and the young woman is offered a free ride on the carousel.

episodes.title: Cuckoo Clock
episodes.plot: A young girl visits her grandmother and is obsessed with a cuckoo clock on the wall.

episodes.title: In the Water
episodes.plot: A boy sneaks into a closed swimming pool.

episodes.title: - Drawings -
episodes.plot: A teacher notices a boy drawing pictures of people who end up missing.

episodes.title: Taro-chan
episodes.plot: This is the story of a particular rookie police officer who displayed his ventriloquism ability at a traffic safety meeting.

episodes.title: Daidokoro
episodes.plot: This is the story of a female college student who was invited to visit the home of her friend from high school.

episodes.title: Nakami
episodes.plot: This is the story of a particular boy who found a worn-out old doll.

episodes.title: Kabe on'na
episodes.plot: This is the story of a particular college student who fell in love with a woman living in the housing complex across the street.

episodes.title: Rokkâ
episodes.plot: This is the story of a girl in high school who had a crush on a boy.

episodes.title: Nao-chan
episodes.plot: This is a story that happened to a particular boy and his family.

episodes.title: Gatcha
episodes.plot: This is the story of a businessman who was distressed because his work wasn't going well.

episodes.title: Kokubetsu
episodes.plot: This is the story of a particular man who came to visit the village where his relatives lived.

episodes.title: Ominie-san
episodes.plot: This is the story of a new teacher who moved from Tokyo to teach at a middle school in the countryside.

episodes.title: Bugged
episodes.plot: This is the story of a man who faithfully wrote in his journal every day.

episodes.title: Picking Up
episodes.plot: This is the story of a particular college student who picked up something forgotten on a train's overhead rack.

episodes.title: Netsuke
episodes.plot: This is the story of a particular female college student who came to help at her grandmother's store.

episodes.title: Bringer Drums
episodes.plot: This is the story of a particular married couple that moved to a village in the countryside.

episodes.title: Ofuda onna
episodes.plot: This is the story of a man who had just moved into a particular apartment.

episodes.title: Zanbai
episodes.plot: This is the story of a man who went to a particular village in the country on a business trip.

episodes.title: Kakun
episodes.plot: This is the story of a boy named Toshiharu who moved back to the country with his parents.

episodes.title: Kami
episodes.plot: This is the story of a teacher at a particular elementary school who had to work a bit late one day.

episodes.title: Ikai
episodes.plot: This is the story of a particular family that went shopping for their young son's birthday present at a department store.

episodes.title: Amidana
episodes.plot: This is the story of a particular man who did nothing but work, work, work, day in and day out.

episodes.title: Mujun
episodes.plot: This story begins with a phone call that was received at a particular young woman's home, in the middle of the night.

episodes.title: Kasagamisama
episodes.plot: This story is about a boy who went to visit his friend who moved to the countryside.

episodes.title: Tatarare
episodes.plot: This is the story of a particular mother and daughter who were inflicted with a terrible curse.

episodes.title: Tsuki
episodes.plot: This is a story about the members of a particular high school baseball team staying in a lodge for training camp.

episodes.title: Bideo
episodes.plot: This is a story that three middle school students experienced on the last day of summer vacation.

episodes.title: Tomonari-kun
episodes.plot: This is the story of a high school girl and some young boys who lived in a particular housing complex.

episodes.title: Uzuki
episodes.plot: This is the story of a particular group of boys attending an elementary school in the country.
